mapper.select: SELECT account.id, account_type_id, account.`name`, account.`pwd`, account.`status`, account_type.`name` AS account_type_name FROM account LEFT JOIN account_type ON account.account_type_id = account_type.id order by id;

SELECT account.id, account_type_id, account.`name`, account.`pwd`, account.`status`, account_type.`name` AS account_type_name FROM account LEFT JOIN account_type ON account.account_type_id = account_type.id WHERE account.id=#{id};
